summary: Customer not receiving password reset emails
suggested_reply: I see you've been trying to reset your password without receiving the emails. Let me help! I've just manually sent a new reset link to test.user@gmail.com. Please: 1) Check your spam/junk folder, 2) Add support@ourapp.com to your contacts, 3) Try again in about 5 minutes. If you still don't receive it, it's possible there's a typo in the email on your account. Let me know and I can verify the email we have on file.
